title: Deployed LoveRescue to loverescue.app
description: Consolidated landing page into React app, moved domain from separate project, renamed Vercel project to loverescue-app

title: Configured Stripe for LoveRescue
description: Added webhook endpoint, configured STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET, STRIPE_PRICE_ID, STRIPE_ANNUAL_PRICE_ID, STRIPE_PREMIUM_PRICE_ID in Railway

title: Configured Stripe Connect for SuperTool
description: Set up webhook at /webhooks/stripe, added signing secret to Railway, verified endpoint responding correctly

title: Built LinkedIn Easy Apply Bot
description: Cloned NathanDuma/LinkedIn-Easy-Apply-Bot, configured for sales jobs $100K+, remote, senior level, installed dependencies in venv

title: QA Report - LoveRescue
description: Verified landing page (200), login page (200), signup page (200), backend API running, Stripe webhook configured, domain consolidated

title: Built Cupid Admin Center
description: Created admin dashboard for LoveRescue with users list, user detail, analytics pages, platform admin middleware

title: Deployed Wigod Plastic Surgery demo
description: Built and deployed demo site using V2 template at wigod-plastic-surgery.vercel.app

title: Deployed Poggi Plastic Surgery demo
description: Built and deployed demo site using V2 template at poggi-plastic-surgery.vercel.app

title: Configured VAPID keys for push notifications
description: Added VAPID keys to Railway for iOS PWA push notifications, added Google OAuth Client ID to Vercel
